thread.title: 70. Best Of - Old Crow Medicine Show
thread.title_full: 70. Best Of - Old Crow Medicine Show

title: 70. Best Of - Old Crow Medicine Show
text: by Ashade87 I love everything they put out!! Wagon wheel was played at my buddy's funeral..every time it played it got us through...I thank theses guys greatly The whole album is great! by Waymoresoutlaws Been listening to these guys for years and this is an accumulation of all their best! Biography Formed: 1998 in Harrisonburg, VA Genre: Singer/Songwriter Years Active: '90s, '00s, '10s Mountain music revivalists Old Crow Medicine Show spin traditional folk and bluegrass yarns with a rock & roll attitude. Critter Fuqua (vocals/banjo/resonator guitar), Kevin Hayes (guitjo), Morgan Jahnig (upright bass), Ketch Secor (vocals/fiddle/harmonica/banjo), and Willie Watson (vocals/guitar/banjo) may specialize in rags, hollers, and pre-World War II blues, but they were weaned on Nirvana and Public Enemy. The quintet's members -- who are all from different states -- met in New York, hit the... Top Albums and Songs by Old Crow Medicine Show 1.
